data.text: Have mercy upon us, O Lord God of all, and behold us:
And send thy fear upon all the nations that seek not after thee.
Lift up thy hand against the strange nations,
As thou wast sanctified in us before them:
And let them know thee, as we have known thee,
Show new signs, and make other strange wonders:
Raise up indignation, and pour out wrath:
Make the time short, remember the covenant,
Let him that escapeth be consumed by the rage of the fire;
Smite in sunder the heads of the rulers of the heathen,
Gather all the tribes of Jacob together.
A cheerful and good heart will have a care of his meat and diet.
